EV isolated method: The isolated EVs were characterized for number and size distribution and presence of membrane markers by nano tracking analysis (NTA) and immunoblotting. For NTA, a 1/100 dilution of the EV suspension was analyzed in the Nanosight NS-300 instrument to obtain the average number of particles and the size distribution plot. Based on the NTA results, approximately equal concentration of control and TNFα EVs (1.8x1010 particles/ml) were used for each experiment.

Project_Description: To compare the miRNA profiles of extracellular vesicles from naive MSCs and TNF-alpha preconditioned MSCs
